title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 721.0 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 721.0 - Applicability

State Regulations

Bus and other passenger vehicles operating in New York

State and subject to the requirements of Part 720 of this Title are subject to
the provisions of this Part. Operation of one or more leased vehicles shall not
relieve the operator from complying with the provisions of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
721.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
